remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供給區塊的項目數目不平均地被提供給區塊的建構函式的批次大小，該區塊的最後的批次可能會包含少於所要求的項目數目。

Docs.summary: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.BatchBlock%601.Complete%2A>已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.BatchBlock%601.Completion%2A>工作會進入最終狀態它已經處理所有先前可用的資料。 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.BatchBlock%601.Complete%2A> 將區塊等待完成發生，而是會起始要求但要等待完成發生，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.BatchBlock%601.Completion%2A>可能使用的工作。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion { get; }
.property instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion
Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };
member this.Completion : System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.summary: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料流程區塊會時視為完成它目前未處理的訊息，以及當它有保證，不會處理任何其他訊息。 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>完成相關聯的區塊時，會轉換為已完成狀態。 會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>區塊完成其處理成功根據資料流程區塊時的狀態定義語意。 會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>狀態時即為資料流程區塊已完成處理提前因未處理的例外狀況，且會轉換到<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>資料流程區塊完成狀態過早處理，因為收到取消要求。 當工作在<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>狀態，其`Exception`屬性會傳回<xref:System.AggregateException>包含造成失敗之區塊的一或多個例外狀況。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Fault%2A>已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成，且其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.BatchBlock%601.Completion%2A>工作將會進入最終狀態。 判定為失敗的區塊，做為與取消區塊，會造成遺失緩衝的訊息 （未處理的輸入的訊息，以及 unoffered 的輸出訊息）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601 > 執行個體連結到這 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601 > 執行個體可以使用 [ISourceBlock （T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A >，並且它必須只能使用 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader > 執行個體先前提供此來源到目標。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 只有 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601 > 執行個體連結到這 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601 > 執行個體可以使用 [ISourceBlock （T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A >，並且它必須只能保留 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader > 執行個體先前提供此來源到目標。
如果`true`傳回，則 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601 > 後續必須呼叫任何一個 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601。ConsumeMessage %2a > 或 [ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A > 此訊息。 若要這樣做可能會導致無法傳播到這個或其他目標的任何其他訊息的來源。
[ISourceBlock (T\<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A > 必須目標所保留的任何內部鎖定，而不呼叫。 這樣會違反鎖定階層以避免資料流程網路中的死結。

MemberSignature.Value: System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus ITargetBlock<T>.OfferMessage (System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, T messageValue, System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock<T> source, bool consumeToAccept);

Function OfferMessage (messageHeader As DataflowMessageHeader, messageValue As T, source As ISourceBlock(Of T), consumeToAccept As Boolean) As DataflowMessageStatus Implements ITargetBlock(Of T).OfferMessage

virtual System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageStatus System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock<T>.OfferMessage(System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, T messageValue, System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ISourceBlock<T> ^ source, bool consumeToAccept) = System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ITargetBlock<T>::OfferMessage;

Docs.param: A instance that represents the header of the message being offered.
The value of the message being offered.
The offering the message. This may be null.
Set to to instruct the target to call synchronously during the call to , prior to returning , in order to consume the message.
Docs.summary: Offers a message to the , giving the target the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
Docs.returns: The status of the offered message. If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target. If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks. If the target would have otherwise postponed message, but was , is instead returned. If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned. If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned. If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
Docs.exception: The is not valid. -or- may only be true if provided with a non-null .

MemberSignature.Value: public void TriggerBatch ();
.method public hidebysig instance void TriggerBatch() cil managed
Public Sub TriggerBatch ()
public: void TriggerBatch();
member this.TriggerBatch : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Triggers the to initiate a batching operation even if the number of currently queued or postponed items is less than the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在窮盡模式，批次會產生從佇列項目，即使較少的存在比批次大小。
在非窮盡模式中，批次將會產生以非同步方式從延後的項目即使可以耗用超過批次大小所指定的項目數量。

## Remarks 這個方法不會封鎖等候提供項目來源。
